Posts.Content: Kaleidoscopekb wrote: Unfortunately, it's cancer. Invasive ductal carcinoma, grade 3. Small focus of high grade DCIS and lymphvascular invasion. Preliminarily believed to be triple negative. I have a whirlwind of appointments upcoming. MRI, meet with the surgeon, meet for a day with the multidisciplinary breast clinic team, etc. I wish all of you the the best and hope you all receive B9 results Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Well, I got my results today... Kaleidoscopekb Fakeboobs123
